column2: (in football, soccer, rugby, hockey, and some other games) a pair of posts linked by a crossbar and often with a net attached behind it, forming a space into or over which the ball has to be sent in order to score.
Mr Foxley said there were still some problems with organising the event including installing a set of rugby or American Football posts instead of the football goals.
Causing great surprise or wonder; astonishing.
an amazing number of people registered
